Player History
Was claimed off waivers by Toronto on 4/17/1985.
Earned first career win on 4/18/1985...
7/31/1985: Signed a contract extension with Toronto, $1,220,000 per year, for 2 years.
Won World Series with Toronto in 1985...
Released by Toronto on 10/22/1986...
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 4/25/1987 to a minor league deal...
